metadata.titleEn: Dataset of Heihe integrated observatory network: eddy covariance system of Daman Superstation, 2022
metadata.titleCn: 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网：大满超级站涡动相关仪（2022）
metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the Daman superstation eddy covariance system (EC) in the midstream reaches of the Heihe integrated observatory network from January 1 to December 31 in 2022. The site (100.37223° E, 38.85551° N) was located in the Zhangye City in Gansu Province. The elevation is 1556.06 m. The EC was installed at a height of 4.5 m, and the sampling rate was 10 Hz. The sonic anemometer faced north, and the separation distance between the sonic anemometer and the CO2/H2O gas analyzer (CSAT3&Li7500A) was 0.17 m.
The raw data acquired at 10 Hz were processed using the Eddypro post-processing software, including the spike detection, lag correction of H2O/CO2 relative to the vertical wind component, sonic virtual temperature correction, coordinate rotation (2-D rotation), corrections for density fluctuation (Webb-Pearman-Leuning correction), and frequency response correction. The EC data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods. The observation data quality was divided into three classes according to the quality assessment method of stationarity (Δst) and the integral turbulent characteristics test (ITC): class 1-3 (high quality), class 4-6 (good), class 7-8 (poor, better than gap filling data), class9 (rejected). In addition to the above processing steps, the half-hourly flux data were screened in a four-step procedure: (1) data from periods of sensor malfunction were rejected; (2) data collected before or after 1 h of precipitation were rejected; (3) incomplete 30 min data were rejected when the missing data constituted more than 10% of the 30 min raw record; and (4) data were rejected at night when the friction velocity (u*) was less than 0.1 m/s. There were 48 records per day, and the missing data were replaced with -6999. Suspicious data were marked in red. 
The released data contained the following variables: data/time, wind direction (Wdir, °), wind speed (Wnd, m/s), the standard deviation of the lateral wind (Std_Uy, m/s), virtual temperature (Tv, ℃), H2O mass density (H2O, g/m3), CO2 mass density (CO2, mg/m3), friction velocity (ustar, m/s), stability (z/L), sensible heat flux (Hs, W/m2), latent heat flux (LE, W/m2), carbon dioxide flux (Fc, mg/ (m2s)), quality assessment of the sensible heat flux (QA_Hs), quality assessment of the latent heat flux (QA_LE), and quality assessment of the carbon flux (QA_Fc). In this dataset, the time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30; the data were stored in *.xls format. Detailed information can be found in the suggested references.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2022年1月1日至2022年12月31日的黑河流域地表过程综合观测网中游大满超级站涡动相关仪观测数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市大满灌区内，下垫面是玉米。观测点的经纬度是100.37223E, 38.85551N，海拔1556.06m。涡动相关仪的架高4.5m，采样频率是10Hz，超声朝向是正北向，超声风速温度仪（CSAT3）与CO2/H2O分析仪（Li7500A）之间的距离是17cm。
涡动相关仪的原始观测数据为10Hz，发布的数据是采用Eddypro软件处理的30分钟数据，其处理的主要步骤包括：野点值剔除，延迟时间校正，坐标旋转（二次坐标旋转），频率响应修正，超声虚温修正和密度（WPL）修正等。同时对各通量值进行质量评价，主要是大气平稳性（Δst）和湍流相似性特征（ITC）的检验。对Eddypro软件输出的30min通量值也进行了筛选：（1）剔除仪器出错时的数据；（2）剔除降水前后1h的数据；（3）剔除10Hz原始数据中每30min内缺失率大于10%的数据。观测数据的平均周期为30分钟，一天48个数据，缺失数据标记为-6999。
发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，风向Wdir（°），水平风速Wnd（m/s），侧向风速标准差Std_Uy（m/s），超声虚温Tv（℃），水汽密度H2O（g/m3），二氧化碳浓度CO2（mg/m3），摩擦速度Ustar（m/s），奥布霍夫长度L（m），感热通量Hs（W/m2），潜热通量LE（W/m2），二氧化碳通量Fc（mg/(m2s)），感热通量的质量标识QA_Hs，潜热通量的质量标识QA_LE，二氧化碳通量的质量标识QA_Fc。感热、潜热、二氧化碳通量的质量标识分为九级（质量标识1-3数据质量好，4-6数据质量较好，7-8数据质量较差（较插补数据好）；9数据质量差））。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xls格式存储。
黑河流域地表过程综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就一直是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持了中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，先前的研究发现，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展是非常重要的。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频繁发生，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013），咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，包括2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度，风速和风向的梯度；空气压力、降水和土壤湿度剖面）通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测，同时也记录了地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Verification.QuestionEn: Are long-term observations considered indispensable for understanding oasis–desert interactions?
Verification.QuestionCn: 长期观察被认为是理解绿洲与沙漠相互作用不可或缺的吗？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are the data collection techniques for oasis–desert systems primarily based on eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, or another technology?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 绿洲-沙漠系统的数据收集技术主要基于涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪还是其他技术？
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 涡度相关系统和闪烁仪

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What data processing steps are involved in handling eddy covariance data in arid and semiarid regions?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区处理涡度协方差数据涉及哪些数据处理步骤？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: raw data filtering, delay time correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, sonic virtual temperature correction, density correction, quality assessment
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 原始数据过滤、延迟时间校正、坐标旋转、频率响应校正、声学虚温校正、密度校正、质量评估

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are observational datasets from oasis–desert systems typically collected?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 观察性数据集通常在绿洲-沙漠系统中收集的地点是哪里？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Who provides access to datasets of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 谁提供对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集的访问？
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 国家青藏高原科学数据中心

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data processing method used to ensure the quality and accuracy of observational data in arid regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于确保干旱地区观测数据质量和准确性的数据处理方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: The data processing method includes using Eddypro software to process raw 10Hz data into 30-minute averaged data. The steps involve outlier removal, time delay correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, ultrasonic virtual temperature correction, and density (WPL) correction.
Example.AnswerCn: 数据处理方法包括使用Eddypro软件将原始10Hz数据处理为30分钟平均数据。步骤包括异常值去除、时间延迟校正、坐标旋转、频率响应校正、超声虚拟温度校正和密度（WPL）校正。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in data collection for ecological studies in inland river basins within arid and semiarid areas?
Example.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域生态研究中，数据收集面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge in data collection for ecological studies in these areas includes dealing with ecological degradation issues such as drying rivers and lakes, natural vegetation degradation, intensified land desertification, and frequent dust storms.
Example.AnswerCn: 在这些地区，生态研究数据收集面临的一个挑战是应对生态退化问题，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the essential characteristics of a dataset used to study energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于研究绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据集的基本特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: long-term observational data, energy fluxes, water vapor fluxes, carbon fluxes, methane fluxes, hydrometeorology data, vegetation parameters, soil parameters, eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, automatic weather stations, radiation data, soil heat flux data, temperature gradients, humidity gradients, wind speed, wind direction, air pressure, precipitation, soil moisture
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 长期观测数据、能量通量、水汽通量、碳通量、甲烷通量、水文气象数据、植被参数、土壤参数、涡度相关系统、闪烁仪、自动气象站、辐射数据、土壤热通量数据、温度梯度、湿度梯度、风速、风向、气压、降水、土壤湿度

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the main challenges in collecting and maintaining long-term observational data in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中收集和维护长期观察数据的主要挑战是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: ecological environment degradation, drying rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, frequent dust storms, stability and accuracy of data collection equipment, consistent data quality and completeness
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 生态环境退化，河流和湖泊干涸，自然植被退化，土地荒漠化加剧，沙尘暴频发，数据采集设备的稳定性和准确性，数据质量和完整性的一致性。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How frequently are data samples collected using the eddy covariance system in the observational datasets?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在观测数据集中，涡度协方差系统的数据样本收集频率是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is an eddy covariance system in the context of data collection for surface processes?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在表面过程的数据收集中，涡度协方差系统是一种用于测量气体交换和能量流动的技术。
Definition.AnswerEn: An eddy covariance system is a data collection method used to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data related to energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes. It involves measuring the covariance between vertical wind speed and scalar quantities like temperature or gas concentrations to determine fluxes in ecosystems.
Definition.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统是一种数据采集方法，用于获取与能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量相关的半小时湍流通量数据。它通过测量垂直风速与温度或气体浓度等标量量之间的协方差来确定生态系统中的通量。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does the term 'quality control procedure' mean in the context of data processing in surface process observation?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在表面过程观察的数据处理上下文中，“质量控制程序”一词指的是确保数据准确性、一致性和可靠性的系统化方法和步骤。这些程序通常包括数据验证、错误检测、数据清理和标准化等过程，以确保最终数据符合预定的质量标准。
Definition.AnswerEn: The term 'quality control procedure' in this context involves a series of steps during data processing to ensure the accuracy and reliability of collected datasets. This includes data collection, processing, and archiving, with filtering and correction techniques applied to raw data, such as outlier removal, delay time correction, coordinate rotation, and other adjustments to maintain data integrity.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在此上下文中，“质量控制程序”涉及在数据处理过程中一系列步骤，以确保收集数据集的准确性和可靠性。这包括数据收集、处理和归档，对原始数据应用过滤和修正技术，如去除异常值、延迟时间修正、坐标旋转以及其他调整，以维护数据的完整性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data processing steps for eddy covariance systems in the Heihe River Basin compare to the procedures used in other arid and semiarid regions?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在黑河流域的涡度协方差系统的数据处理步骤与其他干旱和半干旱地区使用的程序相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Data processing steps for eddy covariance systems in the Heihe River Basin involve using Eddypro software for 30-minute data processing, including steps like outlier removal, time delay correction, coordinate rotation, and frequency response correction. This process may vary from other regions based on software used, frequency of data collection, and specific environmental conditions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在黑河流域，涡动协方差系统的数据处理步骤包括使用Eddypro软件进行30分钟数据处理，涉及的步骤有异常值去除、时间延迟校正、坐标旋转和频率响应校正。这个过程可能因所使用的软件、数据采集频率和特定环境条件而与其他地区有所不同。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in challenges faced when collecting energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data in oasis–desert ecosystems compared to more temperate ecosystems?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在收集绿洲-沙漠生态系统与更温和生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换数据时面临的挑战有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Challenges in oasis–desert ecosystems include ecological environment degradation, such as drying rivers, vegetation degradation, and desertification, which are less pronounced in temperate ecosystems. Additionally, oasis–desert areas often experience more frequent dust storms and have distinct hydrometeorological conditions impacting data collection.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 绿洲-沙漠生态系统面临的挑战包括生态环境退化，如河流干涸、植被退化和沙漠化，这些问题在温带生态系统中不那么明显。此外，绿洲-沙漠地区通常经历更频繁的沙尘暴，并且具有独特的水文气象条件，影响数据收集。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What underlying patterns can be inferred from the half-hourly turbulent flux data acquired by the eddy covariance system in oasis–desert ecosystems regarding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从通过涡度协方差系统获取的绿洲-沙漠生态系统的半小时湍流通量数据中，可以推断出关于能量、水蒸气和碳交换的潜在模式。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The half-hourly turbulent flux data provide insights into the dynamics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems. These patterns can reveal how these ecosystems interact and maintain ecological stability, which is crucial for achieving sustainability goals like carbon peaking and neutrality.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 半小时的湍流通量数据提供了对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换动态的洞察。这些模式可以揭示这些生态系统如何相互作用并维持生态稳定性，这对于实现碳达峰和碳中和等可持续发展目标至关重要。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can be inferred about the significance of quality control procedures in processing hydrometeorological and flux data for oasis–desert systems?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 可以推断出，在处理绿洲-沙漠系统的水文气象和通量数据时，质量控制程序的重要性。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Quality control procedures are vital for ensuring the reliability of hydrometeorological and flux data, which support a quantitative understanding of oasis–desert interactions. These procedures help maintain data integrity and accuracy, crucial for supporting sustainable development and ecological security in these regions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 质量控制程序对于确保水文气象和通量数据的可靠性至关重要，这些数据支持对绿洲-沙漠相互作用的定量理解。这些程序有助于维护数据的完整性和准确性，这对支持这些地区的可持续发展和生态安全至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying causes that necessitate the use of Eddypro software for processing and refining the flux data collected by the eddy covariance system in this field?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 使用Eddypro软件处理和精炼由涡度协方差系统收集的通量数据的潜在原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The use of Eddypro software is necessitated by the need to process raw 10Hz data into usable 30-minute intervals. This involves several key steps such as outlier removal, time delay correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, virtual temperature correction, and density correction. These steps are essential for ensuring the accuracy and reliability of the flux data, which is crucial for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 使用Eddypro软件是为了将原始的10Hz数据处理成可用的30分钟间隔。这涉及几个关键步骤，如异常值去除、时间延迟校正、坐标旋转、频率响应校正、虚拟温度校正和密度校正。这些步骤对于确保通量数据的准确性和可靠性至关重要，这对于理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换非常重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is there a need to establish multiple land surface flux and meteorological stations in arid regions, particularly in the context of oasis–desert systems?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，特别是在绿洲-沙漠系统的背景下，建立多个地表通量和气象站的必要性是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Establishing multiple land surface flux and meteorological stations is critical in arid regions to capture the complex interactions and exchanges of energy, water vapor, and carbon between oasis and desert systems. The presence of diverse microclimates and ecological conditions necessitates comprehensive data collection to support sustainable oasis development and to understand the ecological stability and socioeconomic impact of oases.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区建立多个地表通量和气象站对于捕捉绿洲与沙漠系统之间能量、水蒸气和碳的复杂相互作用和交换至关重要。多样的微气候和生态条件要求进行全面的数据收集，以支持可持续的绿洲发展，并理解绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济影响。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the data quality challenges faced in collecting flux measurements in oasis–desert ecosystems, and how are they addressed?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在收集绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的通量测量时，哪些因素导致数据质量挑战，以及如何解决这些问题？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Data quality challenges in oasis–desert ecosystems arise from factors such as instrument errors, environmental conditions like precipitation, and data gaps. These are addressed by implementing quality control procedures that involve the exclusion of data with high error rates, particularly around precipitation events, and ensuring that missing data within a 30-minute interval do not exceed 10%. This rigorous approach helps in maintaining the integrity and usefulness of the collected measurements.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，数据质量挑战源于仪器误差、降水等环境条件以及数据缺失。这些问题通过实施质量控制程序来解决，具体措施包括排除高误差率的数据，特别是在降水事件发生时，并确保在30分钟的时间间隔内缺失的数据不超过10%。这种严格的方法有助于维护所收集测量数据的完整性和实用性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using long-term observational datasets from oasis–desert ecosystems on understanding carbon cycle dynamics?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用来自绿洲-沙漠生态系统的长期观测数据集对理解碳循环动态的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using long-term observational datasets from oasis–desert ecosystems can provide a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange, which is crucial for recognizing oasis–desert interactions. It significantly contributes to protecting the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases and can affect the carbon balance of arid regions, playing an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用来自绿洲-沙漠生态系统的长期观测数据集，可以定量理解能量、水蒸气和碳的交换，这对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要。它对保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要贡献，并可能影响干旱地区的碳平衡，在全球碳循环中发挥着越来越重要的作用。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How do data processing and quality control procedures impact the reliability of data collected from eddy covariance systems in arid regions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序如何影响在干旱地区从涡度协方差系统收集的数据的可靠性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Data processing and quality control procedures, such as data collection, processing, and archiving, ensure the reliability of data collected from eddy covariance systems. These procedures involve steps like outlier removal, delay time correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, and quality assessment, which enhance the accuracy and reliability of the datasets used in understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序，如数据收集、处理和归档，确保从涡度协方差系统收集的数据的可靠性。这些程序涉及诸如异常值去除、延迟时间校正、坐标旋转、频率响应校正和质量评估等步骤，这些步骤提高了用于理解干旱地区能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据集的准确性和可靠性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What objectives drive the collection and analysis of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，收集和分析能量、水蒸气和碳交换数据的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objectives include understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality, support ecological security, and ensure sustainable development of oases.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标包括了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，以实现碳达峰和碳中和的目标，支持生态安全，确保绿洲的可持续发展。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems when collecting data in arid and semiarid regions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区收集数据时，保持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡是必要的。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Maintaining the balance between oasis and desert systems is critical to achieving sustainable oasis development, recognizing oasis–desert interactions, and protecting the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续的绿洲发展至关重要，认识到绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用，并保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the goals behind establishing long-term observational datasets in artificial and natural oasis–desert systems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 建立人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的长期观测数据集的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goals are to provide a quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas, which is crucial for recognizing oasis–desert interactions and supporting ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是定量了解绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换，这对于认识绿洲-沙漠相互作用以及支持生态稳定和社会经济发展至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is data quality assessed and ensured in the process of collecting energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data from oasis–desert ecosystems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在收集来自绿洲-沙漠生态系统的能量、水蒸气和碳交换数据的过程中，如何评估和确保数据质量？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Data quality is ensured by using quality indicators for sensible heat, latent heat, and carbon dioxide fluxes, which are classified into nine levels. Levels 1-3 indicate good quality, levels 4-6 indicate fair quality, levels 7-8 indicate poorer quality (better than interpolated data), and level 9 indicates poor quality. The process involves screening out data affected by instrument errors and adverse weather conditions.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据质量通过使用 sensible heat、latent heat 和二氧化碳通量的质量指标来确保，这些指标被分为九个等级。等级 1-3 表示良好质量，等级 4-6 表示一般质量，等级 7-8 表示较差质量（优于插值数据），而等级 9 表示差质量。该过程涉及筛选受仪器错误和不利天气条件影响的数据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are employed in the integration and archiving of long-term datasets from multiple stations in arid regions for studying oasis–desert interactions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在研究绿洲与沙漠相互作用时，整合和归档来自多个站点的长期数据集所采用的方法论是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The integration involves collecting long-term energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes along with auxiliary hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil data from various stations. Data is gathered at set intervals (e.g., half-hourly for turbulent flux data) and processed through data collection, processing, archiving, and sharing stages. This ensures comprehensive coverage and consistency across multiple stations in the study region.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该集成涉及收集长期的能量、水汽、碳和甲烷通量，以及来自各个站点的辅助水文气象、植被和土壤数据。数据以设定的时间间隔（例如，湍流通量数据每半小时收集一次）进行收集，并经过数据收集、处理、归档和共享阶段。这确保了研究区域内多个站点的全面覆盖和一致性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do environmental challenges, such as desertification and dust storms, impact the data collection process in oasis-desert systems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 环境挑战，如沙漠化和沙尘暴，如何影响绿洲-沙漠系统中的数据收集过程。
Enablement.AnswerEn: Environmental challenges like desertification and dust storms can degrade the ecological environment, affecting data collection through increased land desertification and frequent dust storms, which might interfere with sensor accuracy and reliability in oasis-desert systems.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 环境挑战如沙漠化和沙尘暴会破坏生态环境，影响数据收集，因为土地沙漠化加剧和频繁的沙尘暴可能干扰传感器在绿洲-沙漠系统中的准确性和可靠性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: In what ways do long-term observational datasets of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes contribute to understanding interactions in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 长期观测的能量、水汽和碳通量数据集在理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的相互作用方面贡献了哪些方式？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Long-term observational datasets provide crucial insights into energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange dynamics, enabling a quantitative understanding of oasis-desert interactions, which is significant for ecological stability and socioeconomic development in these ecosystems.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 长期观测数据集提供了对能量、水汽和碳交换动态的重要见解，使我们能够定量理解绿洲-沙漠相互作用，这对这些生态系统的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be challenges in maintaining long-term observations of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，维持能源、水汽和碳交换的长期观测可能面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms. These factors make it difficult to maintain long-term observations, especially in areas like the Tarim River basin or the Aral Sea basin.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频繁发生。这些因素使得长期观测变得困难，尤其是在塔里木河流域或咸海流域等地区。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected reasons for the necessity of a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，量化理解能量、水蒸气和碳交换的必要性预期有以下几个原因：
Expectation.AnswerEn: A quantitative understanding is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases. It supports achieving the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and ensures the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 定量理解对于认识绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，对保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义。它支持实现绿洲-沙漠地区碳达峰和碳中和的目标，并确保绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for capturing long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中捕捉长期能量、水蒸气和碳通量的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers is effective for capturing long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in oasis–desert ecosystems as these methods provide half-hourly turbulent flux data that are essential for understanding the interactions within these systems. These technologies allow for detailed and continuous measurement of the exchange processes, which are crucial for assessing ecological stability and supporting sustainable development.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪的使用对于捕捉绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的长期能量、水蒸气和碳通量是有效的，因为这些方法提供了每半小时一次的湍流通量数据，这对于理解这些系统内的相互作用至关重要。这些技术允许对交换过程进行详细和连续的测量，这对于评估生态稳定性和支持可持续发展至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in maintaining data quality and consistency when dealing with large datasets from multiple land surface flux and meteorological stations in arid regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在处理来自干旱地区多个地表通量和气象站的大型数据集时，维护数据质量和一致性可能面临的挑战有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Potential challenges in maintaining data quality and consistency include dealing with the variability of environmental conditions in arid regions, which can lead to data gaps or inconsistencies. Additionally, the need for rigorous data processing and quality control procedures, such as coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, and quality evaluation of flux values, is crucial to ensure the reliability of the data collected from multiple stations.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 维护数据质量和一致性可能面临的挑战包括应对干旱地区环境条件的变化，这可能导致数据缺口或不一致。此外，严格的数据处理和质量控制程序的必要性，例如坐标旋转、频率响应校正和通量值的质量评估，对于确保从多个站点收集的数据的可靠性至关重要。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't figure out what data collection techniques are used to measure energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert ecosystems.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法弄清楚在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中用于测量能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据收集技术。
Assertion.AnswerEn: In oasis-desert ecosystems, data collection techniques include the use of eddy covariance systems, which provide half-hourly turbulent flux data, and scintillometers. These are complemented by automatic weather stations that record hydrometeorological data, including radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, air temperature and humidity gradients, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，数据收集技术包括使用涡度协方差系统，该系统提供半小时的湍流通量数据，以及闪烁仪。这些数据还通过自动气象站进行补充，自动气象站记录水文气象数据，包括辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水量和土壤湿度剖面。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the importance of using long-term observational datasets in studying oasis-desert interactions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在研究绿洲-沙漠相互作用时使用长期观测数据集的重要性感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Long-term observational datasets are crucial for studying oasis-desert interactions as they provide a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange over time. This information is significant for recognizing interactions, maintaining ecological stability, supporting socioeconomic development, and achieving goals like carbon peaking and neutrality in these regions.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 长期观测数据集对于研究绿洲-沙漠相互作用至关重要，因为它们提供了对能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解。这些信息对于识别相互作用、维持生态稳定、支持社会经济发展以及实现这些地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标具有重要意义。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the methodologies employed to address challenges in collecting high-quality energy, water vapor, and carbon flux data in arid and semi-arid oasis-desert ecosystems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在干旱和半干旱绿洲-沙漠生态系统中收集高质量能量、水蒸气和碳通量数据所面临的挑战及其应对方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Data in oasis-desert ecosystems are collected using an eddy covariance system and scintillometer for half-hourly turbulent flux data. Automatic weather stations provide hydrometeorological data with a 10-minute average period, supplemented by vegetation and soil parameter data. The data processing includes steps like collection, processing, and archiving, with quality control procedures such as outlier removal and delay time correction.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪收集半小时的湍流通量数据。自动气象站提供10分钟平均的水文气象数据，并补充植被和土壤参数数据。数据处理包括收集、处理和归档等步骤，质量控制程序包括异常值去除和延迟时间校正。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate potential strategies for improving the reliability and quality of observational datasets in inland river basins facing ecological degradation.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查改善面临生态退化的内陆河流流域观察数据集的可靠性和质量的潜在策略。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Improving reliability could involve enhancing long-term observation networks and integrating auxiliary datasets like hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters. Employing advanced data processing strategies such as coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, and density corrections can also enhance data quality and reliability.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 提高可靠性可能涉及增强长期观测网络，并整合水文气象、植被和土壤参数等辅助数据集。采用先进的数据处理策略，如坐标旋转、频率响应校正和密度校正，也可以提高数据质量和可靠性。
